name: background was interesting experience
reviewBody: I was an extra in this movie........would never do it again, although I'm not sorry I did it........Dolly Parton was so neat to all of us, much more than the "lesser" actors in the piece. Received $50 for standing in the rain without a rain coat, over a 12 hour period! You can see me jumping up and down in the scene (this was "acting" designed to show how interested I was in what was going on) where Amy Madigan confronts Dolly about advice given to her boyfriend. When we saw this film in the theatre my daughter and I completely broke up; of course no one else in the theatre could understand why these 2 fools were nearly rolling on the floor laughing.
